hadiths.text: Abu Sa'id al-Khudri reported Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) as saying:He who amongst you drinks Nabidh should drink that (prepared either from) grapes alone, or from dates alone, or from unripe dates alone (and not by mixing them with one another)

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ انْتِبَاذِ التَّمْرِ وَالزَّبِيبِ مَخْلُوطَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: It is disliked to make Nabidh by mixing dried dates and raisins
